definition: the act of grafting something onto something else, place the organ of a donor into the body of a recipient
details:
noun
- the act of grafting something onto something else
= synonyms: grafting
- the practice of offering something (usually money) in order to gain an illicit advantage
= synonyms: bribery
- (surgery) tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient
= synonyms: transplant
verb
- place the organ of a donor into the body of a recipient
= synonyms: transplant
- cause to grow together parts from different plants
= example: cause to grow together parts from different plants
= synonyms: engraft, ingraft
